page.title: 03Survey Page 2
page.content: {3.}I asked this question because the policing in towns and is different than in villages "Do you think there is adequate policing in this area.{ {Yes_85% NO_10% Don't know_5% Alison {4.}The Boundry Walk was held this year after 11yrs so I asked "Would you like to do the Boundry Walk ":_ {Every year_28% Every 10yrs_58% {Not at all_14%} {Linda {5.}There are a lot of holiday homes in the area so I asked "What do you think about the number of Holiday Homes"?{ {Too many_65% Not enough_4% {Adequate_31%} {Keira {6.}My question was "What do yoy think of the number of clubs and societies in the Bassenthwaite area"? {Enough_56% Not enough_42% {Too many_2%} {Emma P. The group 15_22yrs said Not enough_93% while the group 45+yrs said enough_82%
